main.description: An identification suggestion for an existing observation. Used to propose or agree with a taxonomic identification.

subject.description: A strong reference (CID + URI) to the observation being identified.

taxonName.description: The scientific name being proposed for the observation.

taxonRank.description: The taxonomic rank of the identification (e.g., species, genus, family).

comment.description: Explanation or reasoning for this identification.

isAgreement.description: If true, this identification agrees with the current community ID rather than proposing a new one.

confidence.description: The identifier's confidence level in this identification.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when this identification was created.
